```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(knitr)
```

```{r}
data_9_24 <- read_xlsx("raw-data/class_enrollment_summary_by_term_9.24.19.xlsx", skip = 3) %>% clean_names()
data_9_17 <- read_xlsx("raw-data/class_enrollment_summary_by_term_9.17.19.xlsx", skip = 3) %>% clean_names()
comparison <- left_join(data_9_17, data_9_24, by = "course_id", suffix = c(".17", ".24")) %>% 
  mutate(drops = u_grad.17 - u_grad.24) %>% 
  arrange(desc(drops)) %>% 
  select(course_name.24, u_grad.24, u_grad.17, drops)
comparison %>%
  kable()
```
